testcase.name: All users can see their own usernames in the profile menu
testcase.failure:
Given The user on the login page............................................passed Given The user logs in as a "Driver"........................................passed When The user put "user1" and "UserUser123".................................passed Then The users should see their "user1" in the profile menu.................failed
